pages.text: $(li)Poisonous Potatoes rarely can be found when you harvest regular $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/potato)Potatoes$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will inflict the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Poison$(/l) effect if you eat it, inflicting damage to you every few of seconds until you have one half of heart of life.
